q: Is my journal private and secure?
a: Absolutely! Your thoughts are precious and private. We use enterprise-grade encryption to ensure your entries remain completely secure and only accessible to you.

q: How can I organize my thoughts?
a: Create beautiful collections to organize your entries by themes, dreams, or memories. You can also filter by date and mood to revisit specific moments.
Express how you're feeling with each entry! Our mood tracking creates a beautiful visual timeline of your emotional journey, helping you understand yourself better.

q: Can I use this on my phone?
a: Yes! Riceee works beautifully on any device - phone, tablet, or computer. Write your thoughts anytime, anywhere.
